ygData.subject: I'm Back!
ygData.msgSnippet: (ooc: I m so sorry you guys. something very unexpected happened and i couldnt get online for the past few days. im very sorry. i hope i didnt hold things up

(ooc: I'm so sorry you guys. something very unexpected happened and i 
couldnt get online for the past few days. im very sorry. i hope i didnt hold 
things up too much. i dont have much time online, so i'll have to write 
short posts)

Cepta watched all the bots being ordered around by Megatron after he had 
landed, so she knew that he was commander. She heard him order her to go 
with Astroblast, but she wasn't sure who that was.

"Um, exuse me," she said, gathering courage and walking toward Megatron but 
looking nerviously around, "Who did you want me to go with .. sir?"




Element smiled to himself in satisfaction when a good number of the 
attackers retreated. He looked around to find a new target and then spotted 
Abominus. Element growled. He had attacked that robot earlier, but Galaxor 
was already fighting him by then. From what he saw in front of him, he 
wasn't sure if Galaxor was winning.

"Need any help?" Element asked Galaxor in a deep voice while coming up 
behind Abominus and stopping a few dozen yards from him. He fired two 
missiles at Abominus, and mentally aimed them toward Abominus's head.




Cyndro's scanners reported alot of the enemies retreating, and that let him 
concentrate on the enemies that were still here. He fired several missiles 
at Abominus, and then continued to shoot at Hell Beast's group with EMP 
blasts, lasers, and more missiles. Cyndro was a deadly aimer, and since most 
of Hell Beast's troops were distracted with battle, his shots should hit 
very well.

The jammer was still blocking all enemy transmissions, and he knew that 
would make it harder for the enemy to make an organized retreat. He decided 
to make it even more disorganized, and assaulted the retreating robots with 
a few EMP blasts and missiles. Ever missile that he fired was a seeking one.





Antagony smiled at Vlad when he complimented her name. He seemed a bit out 
of place in this base. Antagony glanced back at Perndabot to compare Vlad to 
him, and decided that they were pretty different robots. She then looked 
back at Vlad and smiled.

"Why thank you. I hope we'll be friends, but I still have to officially join 
this team." She looked back at Perndabot. "Do I have to speak to your 
commander about joining or can I just join up?"





The five Maximal robots that had crashed earlier on the planet activated and 
exited their pods. Using their scanners, they found each other and began to 
asses their situation. (sorry that's so short, I have to go! :)
